stripped_text: When you install this program, place 3 power counters on it. Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card.
text:
When you install this program, place 3 power counters on it.
Whenever you breach R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card.
title: Nyashia
